div.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, May 15, 1931. THIS AND THAT(Editorial)

body.p: What we had advocated in Chicago at different times recently became a reality. Last Sunday, a two-act musical comedy was given by the members of St. Simon's parish. Although it was the first time for most of the actors to appear in a play, they gave the audience a wonderful surprise. We congratulate them on their success, and sincerely hope this achievement will give incentive to future attempts to produce entertainment.
Therefore, let us keep up the good work, and give our parishioners and friends more amusements of this kind.
